ðŸ“– Summary: mpvpaper is a wallpaper program designed for wlroots-based Wayland compositors, enabling users to play videos as their desktop background. It leverages mpv for video playback and offers functionalities such as forwarding mpv options and control through keyboard bindings or an mpv input-ipc-server, providing a dynamic and customizable wallpaper experience.
